item.title: NSX-T firewall with Terraform
item.description: This article is to show an exemple of how to manage NSX-T firewall rules as a code through Terraform. You can find the project on my github account : nsxt-fwaas-tf-cm and nsxt-fwaas-tf-rm I will describe the structure of the project, the Terraform code then finish with an exemple. The below diagram show a summary of how I organized the project in order to fully use infrastructre as code.
